(Simplified: 蛱)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 夾 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 虫 [ chóng ] insect, worm; mollusk
    • 夾 [ jiā ] to support; to be wedged between
①(蛺蝶)蝴蝶的一類，前足短小，觸角錘狀，成蟲赤黃色，對農作物有害。
蛺蝶 [ jiá dié ]: nymphalid; butterfly
(Simplified: 蛱)

蛺字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛺； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1083第26
【唐韻】古協切【集韻】吉協切，?音頰。【說文】蛺蝶也。【長箋】其形夾，故从夾，加虫。【本草】蛺蝶輕薄，夾翅而飛。詳蝶字註。　又【集韻】轄夾切，音洽。訖洽切，音夾。義?同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1083 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Ancient Xie cut [Ji Yun] Ji Xie cut, sound cheek. [Said the text] Butterflies also. [Long note] Its shape clip, so from the clip, add worms. 【Materia Medica】Vanesses are light and thin, and fly with their wings. Detailed butterfly note.　[Jiyun] Administer clip cutting, sound harmony. Qiaqie, sound clip. Righteous? Same.
